# 0xA5DF

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Move slow and break things

## Highlights

  * [Placed 2nd on Reserve Protocol audit](https://code4rena.com/contests/2023-01-reserve-contest#top)

In this audit, I came 2nd and found 1 high and 3 medium severity
vulnerabilities. In the following mitigation contest I came #1

  * Ranked #45 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #45 on Code4rena's all time leaderboard,
having earned $67k+ in awards (excluding invitational contests)

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).
